survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about their experience with the company's digital onboarding process, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the digital onboarding process did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the digital onboarding process did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, did you face during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, did you face during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing the digital onboarding materials?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing the digital onboarding materials?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional suggestions for improving the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture actionable feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional suggestions for improving the digital onboarding process?
